meanings.definition: The quality of being communal or shared by a group.
meanings.sent1: The communality of the park was evident as families gathered for a picnic.
meanings.sent2: The communality among the team members helped them achieve their goal together.
meanings.sent3: The communality of the neighborhood watch group made fighting crime feel like a team sport.
meanings.sent4: The communality of ideas in the brainstorming session sparked creativity like a shared flame.
meanings.sent5: The communality of the potluck dinner made everyone feel like part of a big family.

meanings.definition: A sense of community or commonality among a group of people.
meanings.sent1: The strong communality in the small town made newcomers feel welcome.
meanings.sent2: The communality shared by the students created a supportive learning environment.
meanings.sent3: The communality of interests among the book club members led to lively discussions.
meanings.sent4: The communality of experiences among the travelers bonded them like old friends.
meanings.sent5: The communality of goals united the team in working towards a common purpose.
